channel.title: [FM] The Zombie Apocalypse (Canned)
channel.description:
[color=lightgreen]Welcome[/color] = Hello folks and welcome to this game! Btw this game is actually open now
[color=lightgreen] Rules[/color] =
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not screenshot private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Do not use me big boi letters or me colorz 7. Editing is allowed if you are correcting spelling mistakes other than that you need me permission. Also no deleting posts.
[color=lightgreen]Gameplay[/color] = Days will be 72 hours long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 48 hour long, or shorter if everyone sent their actions in Actions are done by messaging me Zombies have a night chat All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in my class card section When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
[color=lightgreen]Executions[/color] = To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by messaging me After the votes are revealed a player will be decided as innocent or guilty, Executions end the Day Trials pause the counter
[color=lightgreen]Journals/Deathnotes[/color] = Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
[color=lightgreen]To Join[/color] = To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
Rolelist: **[color=green]Barricader[/color]** **[color=green] Supernaturalist [/color]** **[color=green]Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Random Town[/color]** **[color=green]Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Random Town[/color]** **[color=green] Random Town[/color]** **[color=teal] Zombie Hero[/color]** **[color=teal] Random Zombie[/color]** **[color=grey]Werewolf[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]**
Players: (If we can't reach 16 we will start at 15) 1. Hippo 2. Psy 3. PoisonedSquid 4. Firekitten 5. Sam 6. Max 7. MTheJoker 8. Memesky 9. Soulshade55r 10. 11. 12. 13. 14. 15. 16.
Spectators: 1. 2. 3.
Backups: 1. 2. 3.
[color=lightgreen]**Classcards:**[/color] =
**:shield: = Unique** **:brain: = Conversion immune** =
[color=green] Town:[/color] = _Goal ~ You must get rid of all the supernaturals (Werewolf and Zombies)_
[details="Announcer "] > [color=green] Announcer :shield:[/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Social**[/color] > > Passive 1: Special deadly sources ~ You may speak to dead players. You will keep this passive even if your class changes > > Night Ability 1: Announcement ~ Announce something tomorrow via host. 2 use. > > Night Ability 2: Secret Announcement ~ Speak to target player at night. unlimited uses. [/details]
[details="Barricader"] > [color=green] Barricader :shield: :brain: [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Killer**[/color] > > Passive 1: Barricaded In For Now ~ You are immune to occupation/target change once > > Day Ability 1: Barricade ~ Jail a player tonight. You will be able to talk to the jailed target. > > Night Ability 1: Execute ~ Execute target player. If they are town you will lose your execute ability and you will kill them. 3 uses. [/details]
[details="Citizen"] > [color=green] Citizen [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Support**[/color] > > Night Ability 1: Eat Chips ~ Eat chips tonight. This does nothing though. It's for lulz [/details]
[details="Corruptionist"] > [color=green] Corruptionist [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Social**[/color] > > Day Ability 1: Corrupt Voter ~ Make your votes count as 2 when someone is on stand or is being voted. 2 use. Does not inform anyone. > > Night Ability 1: Erase vote ~ Make a player's vote do nothing. It will appear as it does but it won't count. 3 use. > > Night Ability 2: Protection From Votes ~ Protect someone from being voted. It will appear as he is getting voted but it won't do anything. 2 use [/details]
[details="Detective"] > [color=green] Detective [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Investigative**[/color] > > Night Ability 1: Detect ~ Discover 2 class types a player could be. Offensive/Support, Investigative/Social, Killer/Special. > > Night Ability 2: Detection ~ Discover if 2 players are of the same faction. 3 uses. [/details]
[details="Inspector"] > [color=green] Inspector [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Investigative**[/color] > > Day Ability 1: Killer on Eyes ~ Discover if target player will attempt to kill someone tonight. 2 use. > > Night Ability 1: Inspection on :house: ~ Discover who visits target player. unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Inspection on :footprints: ~ Discover who target player visits. unlimited uses. [/details]
[details="Lurer"] > [color=green] Lurer [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Offensive**[/color] > > Passive 1: Must Lure... ~ You are immune to occupation/target change > > Night Ability 1: Come Here! ~ Lure target player to you. You are immune to all effects target player gives you. unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: No One Can Resist This Food ~ Lure target player to you, it bypasses immunity to occupation/target change it will also remove their immunities for the night. 2 uses. [/details]
[details="Musician"] > [color=green] Musician [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Offensive**[/color] > > Passive 1: Musical Songs ~ You are immune to occupation/target change > > Day Ability 1: Music of Pranks ~ Make target player target himself when using his ability. 1 use. > > Night Ability 1: Music of Stop ~ Occupy target player. unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Music All Along ~ Make target player get occupied and everyone visiting him too. Bypasses immunity. 2 use [/details]
[details=" Nurturer"] > [color=green] Nurturer [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Support**[/color] > > Passive 1: Nurtured ~ You are immune to bleeding > > Day Ability 1: Nurture Time! ~ Make target player target immune to all negative effects tonight. 2 use. > > Night Ability 1: Nurture!!! ~ Nurture target player. They will be cured of bleeding if they are bleeding and cured from attacks. unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Nurture Orb ~ Anyone who visits you tonight will be healed. You also will be healed. 2 uses. [/details]
[details="Supernaturalist"] > [color=green] Supernaturalist :shield: :brain: [/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Special**[/color] > > > Day Ability 1: Super Spray ~ Make target player immune to all supernatural effects tonight except kills. 2 use. > > Day Ability 1: Supernaturalism Spray ~ Make target player immune to all supernatural effects as long as you live except kills. 1 use. > > Night Ability 1: Zombie? Werewolf? ~ Discover if target player is a supernatural being or not. > > Night Ability 2: Zombies NO!!! ~ Learn if s zombie visits your target. [/details]
[details="Treasure Hunter"] > [color=green] Treasure Hunter[/color] > = > [color=green] **Town Killing**[/color] > > Night Ability 1: Hunt For Treasure! ~ Go to an area to hunt for treasure. There are 3 areas to go to, Volcano Hill, Enchantful Forest, Sandy Stones. There will be 3 obstacles in each one. You may use 1 hint in each obstacle. If you win you will get an ability/passive if you don't you can always reattempt again. But if you do reattempt an area again you won't have any uses of hint in that area. unlimited uses until you complete all areas. > > Volcano Hill: DA: Volcanic Rage ~ Bleed target player. 2 uses. > > Enchantful Forest: Passive: Enchanted ~ Immune to bleeding > > Sandy stones: NA: Sandstorm ~ Kill anyone attempting to kill you tonight. 3 use [/details]
[color=teal] Zombies:[/color] = _Goal ~ You must get rid of the Town and Werewolf_
[details="Blockader"] > [color=teal] Blockader[/color] > = > [color=teal] **Zombie Offesnsive**[/color] > > Converts from offensive classes and killer classes (Yeah making a class just for killer converts is kinda pointless because there is only 1 killer Town and that's TH) Also spawnable at the start from RZ > > Passive 1: For The Zombies! ~ You are immune to occupation/target change. > > Day Ability 1: Brainks on You ~ Make target player target himself when using his day ability. 1 use. > > Night Ability 1: Target Me For :ice_cream: ~ Make target player target you. You are immune to all effects from target player. 3 use. > > Night Ability 2: Blockade For The Win ~ Occupy everyone visiting target player except for the Zombies. Bypasses immunity. 2 use. [/details]
[details="Examiner"] > [color=teal] Examiner[/color] > = > [color=teal] **Zombie Investigative**[/color] > > Converts from investigative classes Also spawnable at the start from RZ > > Day Ability 1: Brainz Da Same? ~ Check if 2 people are of the same faction. If they are then you will learn their exact classes. 1 use. > > Night Ability 1: Brain Discovery ~ Discover a player's class type. 3 uses. > > Night Ability 2: Keepin in Track ~ Discover who target player visits. 2 use. [/details]
[details="Fraudulent"] > [color=teal] Fraudulent[/color] > = > [color=teal] **Zombie Social**[/color] > > Converts from social classes Also spawnable at the start from RZ > > Passive 1: Zombie To Zombie ~ As long as you are alive the zombies have a day chat and dead zombies can speak living zombies. > > Day Ability 1: Sneak Past Law ~ Make your votes count as 2. No one will know. 1 use. > > Night Ability 1: ~~Fake~~ New Law On Votes ~ Make a player's vote not count. Won't tell anyone. 3 use. > > Night Ability 2: Fraud Speech ~ Announce something to the public through the host. 2 use [/details]
[details="Goon"] > [color=teal] Goon[/color] > = > [color=teal] **Zombie Support**[/color] > > Spawnable from RZ only! > > Night Ability 1: Gimme da :brain: ~ Literally does nothing. Just for the lulz. [/details]
[details="Guardian"] > [color=teal] Guardian[/color] > = > [color=teal] **Zombie Support**[/color] > > Converts from support classes Also spawnable from RZ > > Passive 1: Brainz Of Healz ~ You are immune to bleeding. > > Day Ability 1: Confusion? ~ Make a zombie appear as good tonight. 2 uses. > > Night Ability 1: Zombhealth ~ Heal a zombie tonight. 2 use. [/details]
[details="Zombie Hero"] > [color=teal] Zombie Hero :shield: [/color] > = > [color=teal] **Zombie Special**[/color] > > > Passive 1: Cheater Of Brains! ~ You may use both of your night abilities in a night. If you die another zombie will take your place. > > Day Ability 1: Bite ~ Bleed target player. 3 uses. > > Night Ability 1: Brain Control ~ Convert target player. 1 night cool down time. unlimited uses. 4 zombies max. > > Night Ability 2: Order From The Brainz Master ~ Order a Zombie to go kill a player. You can't use the same zombie twice. [/details]
[color=silver] Neutrals:[/color] =
We know nothing about any neutral except the following: Werewolf is the NK and can only attack on certain nights and has 2 forms Witch has a mischievous goal not essentially hurting or helping either faction Warlock has a neutral goal We know nothing about the Enchanter
Uniques are: Witch Werewolf
[color=lightgreen]**Game Events:**[/color] =
Nothing because the game hasn't even started yet

item.title: [FM] The Zombie Apocalypse (Canned)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
I know this poll hasn’t waited around for 24 for hours but the Factville idea is just too amazing

So I have decided with those votes and the Factville idea I’m going to cancel this game and start up the Factville one…

Sorry for everyone who liked it!

Read full topic
